name: CTFontUIFontType
desc: Constants that represent the specific user-interface purpose to specify for font creation.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The user-interface font type isn't specified.

items.name: case user
items.desc: The default font for documents and other text whose font the user can typically change.

items.name: case userFixedPitch
